name: CHEP2016 Landing Page
tagline: Landing page with additional information and material for our poster at CHEP2016
body: # Info *Authors*: L. Bianchi, A. Herten, J. Ritman, T. Stockmanns *Co-authors*: A. Adinetz, J. Kraus, D. Pleiter - More info on [Inspire](http://inspirehep.net/record/1414034) # Download Download the poster: [](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/7819319/chep2016/Poster-448.pdf) # More information - Proceedings from CHEP2015: - Andreas Herten's PhD thesis (Jul 2015): # Contact - Ludovico Bianchi, Forschungszentrum JÃ¼lich, Germany # Poster ID: 448 - Indico page: If you liked the poster, vote for it in the contest: . # Work In Progress All updates to our projects (papers, results, code, ...) will be linked here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
